title: Never Received Icon
body: I sent my friend {{champion:497}}  on the 25th and still haven't received the gift of magic icon. I know there's a two week waiting period but it's been over 2 weeks. Is this normal?

replies.body: Check it out now! Should be good to go ^_^!
